title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for a denominator of ( x 2 −2x+k ) 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadIhadaahaa WcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiEaiabgUcaRiaadUga aiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiaaikdaaaaaaa@3C0D@ or a factor of ( x 2 −2x+k ) − 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadIhadaahaa WcbeqaaiaaikdaaaGccqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiEaiabgUcaRiaadUga aiaawIcacaGLPaaadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaayIW7caaIYaaaaO GaaiOlaaaa@3F47@

The second point is earned for f ′  ( x )= −( 2x−2 ) ( x 2 −2x+k ) 2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaaceWGMbGbauaacaaMi8+aae WaaeaacaWG4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaeyypa0ZaaSaaaeaacqGHsisl daqadaqaaiaaikdacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaa qaamaabmaabaGaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTiaa ikdacaWG4bGaey4kaSIaam4AaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqaba GaaGOmaaaaaaGccaGGUaaaaa@48C6@ A response that calculates the derivative correctly but then simplifies incorrectly will earn the second point, but is not eligible for the third point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes two of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes all three of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned for obtaining A= 1 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGbbGaeyypa0ZaaSaaae aacaaIXaaabaGaaGOnaaaaaaa@368B@ and B=− 1 6 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGcbGaeyypa0JaeyOeI0 YaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGOnaaaaaaa@3779@ with denominators x−4 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGinaa aa@35DC@ and x+2, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGOmai aacYcaaaa@367F@ respectively. Other nonzero numerators with these denominators will not earn the first point, but the response is eligible for the second and third points.

A factorization of ( x+4 )( x−2 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaqadaqaaiaadIhacqGHRa WkcaaI0aaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaeWaaeaacaWG4bGaeyOeI0IaaGOm aaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3B89@ resulting in nonzero numerators is eligible to earn the second point, but not the third point.

Both correct antiderivatives, including use of absolute value, earn the second point.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned for the definite integral ∫ 0 2 1 x 2 −2x+1   dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaWaaSaaaeaaca aIXaaabaGaamiEamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgkHiTiaaikda caWG4bGaey4kaSIaaGymaaaaaSqaaiacobiIWaaabaGaaGOmaaqdca GLRicakiaaykW7caaMc8UaamizaiaadIhaaaa@4348@ split into two integrals at x=1, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGymai aacYcaaaa@36A1@ or work that shows that f ( x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbGaaGjcVpaabmaaba GaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3835@ has a vertical asymptote or infinite discontinuity at x=1. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bGaeyypa0JaaGymai aac6caaaa@36A3@

If the first point is not earned, the response is only eligible for the second point.

The second point requires a correct antiderivative with or without reference to a substitution. Correct limits of integration are not required for the second point.

The third point requires evidence of an improper integral, including use of appropriate limit notation. The third point is earned with a correctly evaluated one-sided limit along with the conclusion of divergence. Only one of the two integrals need to be referenced. Note that any limit that “ = 1 0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaaiaaig daaeaacaaIWaaaaaaa@35BE@ ” makes the response not eligible to earn the third point.
